title: Remove Sanskruti Novelty recommendation card image by deleting the `image` field from Day 3 data

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/data/dwarkaGuide.ts`, locate the Day 3 itinerary item that contains the recommendation card for shop name "संस्कृति नॉवेल्टी (पुरुषोत्तम भाई मच्छर)" and completely delete the `image:` property from that specific recommendation-card object (do not set it to null and do not replace it with any placeholder URL).

quotes:
Completely DELETE the `image:` property from that object.
Do not set it to null, do not set it to a placeholder URL.
JUST DELETE THE LINE.

acceptanceCriteria: The Day 3 recommendation card data object for "संस्कृति नॉवेल्टी (पुरुषोत्तम भाई मच्छर)" contains no `image` key/property at all (it is not present in the source).
No other code re-adds an `image` field to that object at build/runtime (no derived/merged data introduces it).

requirements.text: Ensure the Day 3 recommendation card UI for "संस्कृति नॉवेल्टी (पुरुषोत्तम भाई मच्छर)" renders as text-only (title, subtitle, description) with no image area rendered (no `` and no image container/space).

quotes:
The card should ONLY display:
- Title
- Subtitle
- Description

Update the code now to hide the image area completely.

acceptanceCriteria: When viewing Day 3 in the Yatra Plan tab, the Sanskruti Novelty recommendation card shows only title, subtitle, and description (plus the existing Recommended badge if already present).
There is no `` element rendered for this card and no empty/placeholder image container is present in the DOM for this card.

constraints: Do not add any network/API/canister dependency to implement this change.
Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or any other immutable frontend paths specified by SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not add or generate any new images or placeholder assets for this card.
Do not change the Day 3 itinerary text content aside from removing the `image` property as requested.
